proposal: Hey Crosswise community, with 227 holders and counting, your project is making waves in the DeFi space! Our B2B tools could be a great fit for your vision of bridging the gap between DeFi and CeFi. Imagine having your own lottery or DEX, with revenue shared among your community. And it's as easy as pie, even easier than finding the best exchange rates on a cross-chain swap! See my profile for demo and details.
